Summary: BLACK FLYING WING LIGHTS TOO BIG TO BE B-2
divs: Sighting Details2 ND floor balcony of an apartment on askew lake with another witness.I DO NOT DRINK ALCOHOL.BETWEEN 0200 & 0315 HRS i OBSERVE AN AIRCRAFT COMING IN LOW FROM THE SOUTH MOVING NORTH COULD NOT MAKE OUT A SPECIFIC SHAPE OTHER THAN WHICH i CALL RUNNING LIGHTS FLASHING NOT LIGHT FROM CONVENTIONAL FIXED WING AIRCRAFT OR ROTOR AIRCRAFT AS IT PASSED OVER HEAD THE VEHICLE BLOCKED THE STARS IN SKY SO IT WAS A SOLID OBJECT OCCUPYING SPACE IN THE SKY.THE FIXED WING AIRCRAFT WAS TO LOW AND MOVING TO SLOW TO MAINTAIN ALTITUDE BUT IT DID WHICH IN ITSELF IS A MYSTERY AND MADE NO NOISE ! IF IT WAS A kc135 STRATOTANKER THOSE ju PRAT& WHITNEY TURBINES WOULD HAVE MADE A LOT OF NOISE IF IT WAS AT THAT ALTITUDE & SPEED IT WOULD HAVE CRASHED.i THOUGHT MAYBE A B-2 RIGHT SHAPE BUT WAY TO SMALL AND THEY MAKE NOISE THAT LOW AIR SPEED WOULD HAVE BEEN LOAD THEIR TURBINES WHISTLE I SAW THEM IN DESERT STORM I HAD FIRST HAND EXPERIENCE THEIR JET WASH HEAT PLUME IT'S JUST CHANNELED DIFFERENT THAN A CONVENTIONAL FIXED WING AIRCRAFT.THIS UFO MADE NO NOISE WHATSOEVER BUT IT TOOK UP A LOT OF THE SKY AND THE LIGHTS WERE LIGHTS NOT FLARES I AM FORMER INFANTRY IT WAS NOT ARTILLERY FLARES OR INDIVIDUAL TAC FLARES OR HEAT SEEKER DECOY FLARES TO FOOL GROUND TO AIR MISSILE SYSTEMS NO THESE WERE LARGE RECESSED LIGHTS IN A FUSELAGE THAT LOOK LIKE A FLYING WING. AS A LURP WE USED SALUTE TO REPORT ENEMY GROUND MOVEMENT AND AIR CRAFT AT NIGHT IN THE DAY OR NIGHT WHERE EVER WHEN EVER THIS WASNT ANYTHING I'VE SEEN BEFORE.FIXED WING AIRCRAFT STEALTH OR NOT MAKE A HELL OF A NOISE MAKING A GUN RUN ON TROOPS A10 F4 F16 A117 B2 B52 I HEARD OF THE AURORA IF IT DID EXIST IT WOULD NOT BE AT THE FLY IN AT MCDILL..........THIS THING WAS SILENT AT 300FT SUB 135 KNOTS BIG FROM MY APARTMENT ACROSS THE LAKE OBSERVED 90 SEC COMPOSITE BLACK LIKE A SR72 NO LANDING GEAR OUT NO NOISE FREAKY HUH IT WAS SOME THING UNIDENTIFIED IT SEEMED TO DRINK IN AMBIENT LIGHT & IT WAS HUGE IT DEFIED PHYSICS
